document_data.name: Thard
document_data.mainbody: '''Thard''' was an human barbarian of the [[Sky Pony tribe]] and a member of the adventuring group, the [[Moor Runners]].
document_data.Description: Thard was a hulking man who wore leather armor and wielded a greataxe.His greataxe was etched with the blades of [[Tempus]] emblazoned on a swift steed.His voice was rough and deep.
document_data.Relationships: Thard was the companion and lover of [[Inri]].
document_data.History: Inri was a member of the Moor Runners for years. In [[1364 DR]] he was killed by the [[Red dragon]] [[Tharas'kalagram]]'s fiery breath.
